duties_responsibilities.duty: Grow a book of business by selling professional and/or commercial lines products to prospects and providing best-in-class service to existing clients.
Build relationships with prospects as a trusted advisor and evaluate their risks and coverage needs.
Negotiate with underwriters to obtain appropriate and competitive quotes on behalf of clients and review coverage options provided by underwriters.
Meet established service standards, assist clients with policy coverage questions, and evaluate changes to client operation.
Maintain strong working knowledge of the healthcare delivery system and the exposures related to it, including medical specialties, practice modes, medical facilities, and systems.
Participate in training and educational seminars for professional development, ensure compliance with E&S and state-specific regulations, and research market conditions and changes.
Mentor and train account managers, assist in meeting ProAssurance Agency’s initiatives and goals, and perform special projects as directed by management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business, insurance, or related field is required. Or 8 years of professional level insurance industry experience may be substituted if bachelor’s degree is not achieved.
